title: Pepsi Logo
content:
Greetings Type Guru’s,

I’m trying to figure out what font was used in the second line of this logo “bottling Ventures”. It looks like the e has been modified.

I’m trying to pick a companion/contrasting font for a business card. Any recommendation would be greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090505173716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pepsi_3864.jpg)
author: Thingone

comments.content:
It may have been modeled on House Industries Chalet. e and v modified for sure.

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20090505173716/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet")
But the last two letters look more like a squooshed Myriad.
